definition.name: Basic Test Results
definition.description: Aggregates and processes tests files in CI. Outputs the failed tests as a comment on the PR.
definition.author: codecov

inputs.name: github-token
inputs.description: 'The secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN to be able to interact with the current PR and comment on it.'

inputs.name: directory
inputs.description: Directory to search for test result reports. Will run test processing on all files in the directory.

inputs.name: disable-search
inputs.description: Disable search for test result files. This is helpful when specifying what files you want to run test report processing with the --file option.

inputs.name: file
inputs.description: Path to the junit file to run test result processing.

inputs.name: version
inputs.description: Specify which version of the Codecov CLI should be used. Defaults to `latest`.
